content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1605269227915{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 220px !important;padding-bottom: 220px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/http://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/Untitled-2-06-1.jpg?id=25448) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”new-h1-style”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” el_class=”top-line”][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1461400763131{margin-right: -100px !important;padding-left: 190px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-5 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ offset=”vc_col-xs-2 vc_hidden-xs”]


[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1461400779581{margin-left: -100px !important;padding-right: 190px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-xs-5 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#ffffff”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Careers

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

BE A PART OF Digital Software Labs FAMILY 
“Experience the CAREER THAT MANY DESIRE”

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Sales Executive (Lead Generation program)

Skills:

Verbal communication/fluent in English
Energetic and work orientation
Customer service/Care
Requirements:
Night Shift ( 6 PM to 3 AM)
Experience should be 2 years to the relevant field[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Biding SPECIALISTS

Skills:

We are looking for an Online Bidding Expert with former experience of bidding for projects on Upwork, Fiverr & Freelancer. Duties & Responsibilities:

• Bidding Expert & specialized in writing Proposals

• Preparing estimates and quotations for customers

• Lead generation that results in sales

• Daily communication with clients

• Maintain a very high rating on Upwork/Freelancer/Fiverr etc.

• Gather client requirements, communicate the requirements with the team, and deliver the project to the client. Talking on the phone, chatting applications and Skype depending on the requirement from the client

• Maintain a healthy relationship with the client(s)

• Meet monthly quota of projects

• Ability to communicate with the client in writing and verbally through Skype as well

• Strong Follow-up skills and self-Motivated Required:

• Experience 1 year must on Upwork, freelancer & fiver.

• Salary Basic depends on experience + commissions depend on sales

• Experience with interacting with international[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

WordPress DEVELOPER

Skills:

We are looking for an experienced WordPress developer to join our friendly and hard-working web team.

The ideal candidate will be an enthusiastic individual with a positive attitude; dedication and willingness to work hard, sometimes under high production pressure as well.

Requirements:

– Minimum 1-year experience in programming, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

– Experience in PHP and OOP knowledge is preferred

– Extensive knowledge and experience in building WordPress CMS websites using the best practice & de-facto standard plugins.

– Experience working with WordPress at a PHP code level:

– Knowledge of existing inbuilt WordPress functions

– Creation of plugins/widgets written to conform with the WordPress coding standards

– Creation of clean, logical, well-documented, and re-usable code

Theme/Template integration

– Knowledge of WordPress Network (Multisite) beneficial

Experience creating multi-lingual websites Advantageous

– Knowledge and experience of web accessibility

– Good understanding of cross-platform and cross-browser issues

– Use of jQuery / AJAX / Prototype is preferred[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

GRAPHIC DESIGNER

We are seeking a new Graphic Designer to join our team.

Skills:

The ideal candidate will be an enthusiastic individual with a positive attitude; dedication and willingness to work hard, sometimes under high production pressure as well.

Requirements:

–      6 months or more of experience as a graphic designer

–      Proficiency with Photoshop, Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, and InDesign

–      Effective time management skills and the ability to meet deadlines.

 

 

Job Type:

Full-time[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

DIGITAL MARKETER

We are looking for a candidate who brings value to our Social Media team.

Skills:

The ideal candidate will be an enthusiastic individual with a positive attitude; dedication and willingness to work hard, sometimes under high production pressure as well.

Requirements:

–      1-2 years of experience in a relevant field.

–      Proven working experience in digital marketing.

–      Good communication skills.

–      Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, email, social media campaigns

 

Job Type:

Full-time[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

CONTENT WRITER INTERN

We are looking for a Content Writer Intern

Requirements:

–     Create content for blogs, articles, social media, and the company website.

–    Should be able to write plagiarism-free content.

–    Knowledge of WordPress is a plus point.

[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[vc_column_text css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

SALES ASSOCIATE INTERN

We are looking for a Sales Associate Intern

Requirements:

–   Lead generation through online research and road running

–   Able to manage sales roaster

–    High energy level and excellent customer service skills 

[/vc_column_text]

APPLY NOW
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
